metadata.synopsis: Air Force pilots (Cesar Romero, Chick Chandler) lead a search for a lost rocket and crash-land on an island of dinosaurs.

reviews: An American rocket ship crashes on a Pacific island where the dinosaurs still roam.
Well, one positive thing might have come from this cheapie 1950s sci-fi flick. It's the births that resulted from backseat couplings when it played the drive-in circuit.
